EmailTemplate.name: Quote: Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Quote {!Quote.Name} has been Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Quote.OwnerFirstName},
Your Quote {!Quote.Name} has been Rejected.
Quote - {!Quote.Link} Opportunity - https://tecomcorporatecrm--4cdev.my.salesforce.com/{!Quote.Opportunity_Id__c}
Please login to Salesforce to see the rejection comments.
Kind regards, Salesforce Team
